thread.section_title: Personal Comfort Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Personal Comfort | personalcomfortbed.com
thread.title: Neil

author: Neil
title: Neil
text:
We owned a Sleep Number adjustable queen bed for 10 years and it was great. We wanted to go to a king size bed, so we went ot Sleep Number and priced it out.
After which I looked on line and found Personal Comfort read their reviews and checked out the cost, I even brought it to the Sleep Number store and they said it was very close to their bed.
So we bought it. Great Move!!!
